languages.text: "You mentioned something called 'the One Star' — what is it?"

traits.locale_text: "You mentioned something called 'the One Star' — what is it?"
"You mentioned something called 'the One Star' — what is it?"
"You mentioned something called 'the One Star' — what is it?"
"You mentioned something called 'the One Star' — what is it?"
"You mentioned something called 'the One Star' — what is it?"

languages.text: “你刚刚提到了某个叫‘命运之星’的东西，那是什么？”
languages.original_text: "You mentioned something called 'the One Star' — what is it?"

traits.locale_text: “你刚刚提到了某个叫‘命运之星’的东西，那是什么？”

languages.text: «Ha mencionado algo llamado la "Estrella Única". ¿Qué es?».
languages.original_text: "You mentioned something called 'the One Star' — what is it?"

traits.locale_text: «Ha mencionado algo llamado la "Estrella Única". ¿Qué es?».

languages.text: 「一つ星と呼ばれるものがあると言っていたが、それは何だ？」
languages.original_text: "You mentioned something called 'the One Star' — what is it?"

traits.locale_text: 「一つ星と呼ばれるものがあると言っていたが、それは何だ？」

languages.text: "Ihr habt den sogenannten 'Einen Stern' erwähnt – worum handelt es sich dabei?"
languages.original_text: "You mentioned something called 'the One Star' — what is it?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt den sogenannten 'Einen Stern' erwähnt – worum handelt es sich dabei?"

languages.text: « Vous avez parlé d'une "Étoile unique". De quoi s'agit-il ? »
languages.original_text: "You mentioned something called 'the One Star' — what is it?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez parlé d'une "Étoile unique". De quoi s'agit-il ? »

languages.text: "Bir yadigârdan bahsettin... 'Emsalsiz Yıldız' mıydı? O ne?"
languages.original_text: "You mentioned something called 'the One Star' — what is it?"

traits.locale_text: "Bir yadigârdan bahsettin… 'Emsalsiz Yıldız' mıydı? O ne?"
